GalPRIME

GalPRIME is an efficient, multi-threaded suite for testing surface brightness profile extraction on a set of images, using provided input parameters. It is designed to run smoothly on any provided dataset, and can provide results for bins of various parameters, such as mass, redshift, and star formation probability.
